name: Claw Staff
description:
Claw Staff is a 2d single-screen platformer with a unique clinging mechanic and pseudo-80's pixel art graphics. Jump and cling through a post post post-apocalyptic world populated by strange creatures. Cling to blocks and defeat enemies with the versatile claw staff, controlled with the precise movement of your mouse. Avoid traps and collect the coins to open the gates and progress through challenging and highly replayable levels. Claim the Moon for your power-hungry Emperor and become a champion!

  • Starting from the shelter of the sewers, journey out into the ruins of a past civilization.
  • Procedurally-generated levels, different each time you start a new game.
  • Enemy AI that responds to the presence of the player.
  • Arcade difficulty with no saving. If you run out of lives, its back to the start with you.
  • Optional final bosses!
  • Built from the ground up for keyboard and mouse controls.
  • Undiluted platforming goodness!
